content.rendered: Malachite is the gemstone of transformation, working to clear and cleanse all the chakras. This crystal is especially beneficial for work with the heart chakra, as it radiates the “perfect energy pattern” for stimulating and balancing the heart chakra. Wearing malachite stone jewelry helps you to maintain emotional balance, reminding you to remain positive and optimistic. It carries a very inspiring, healing and purifying energy that has the ability to open your heart to attract all types of love.
